HOME.SLOGAN_TEXT: team.center is reduced to the minimum to organize all your team events like regularly trainings or unregularly events like helper jobs. Use your precious time to train and play instead of using it to organize.

ADV1.TITLE: Participations & Cancellations
ADV1.TEXT: Create Participation & Cancellation events. If you want you can also define per event a minimum and a maximum for the team members.

ADV2.TITLE: Volunteer work Management
ADV2.TEXT: Many clubs have difficulties organizing the many Volunteer work. team.center makes it easy to manage them.

ADV3.TITLE: One password for all
ADV3.TEXT: team.center makes it possible to set the same password for all team members and still have personal logins. Just ask your teammate or use the direct link if you forget your password.

ADV4.TITLE: Be a member of several teams
ADV4.TEXT: In the event overview you will see all the events in which you are included as a team member. You have all your team events displayed in one, central location

ADV5.TITLE: Activate mail notifications
ADV5.TEXT: When creating an event, the admin can decide if the event should be created with automatic mail reminders. The admin can set reminders for 1 day and 7 days before the event starts.

ADV6.TITLE: Team overview and reporting
ADV6.TEXT: Each team member has full transparency about the number of registrations and cancellations of his team mates. For example, club members remember each other automatically for chosing a helper mission, or to cancel a training session. team.center makes life for all coaches much easier.

ACTIVATION.ALREADY_ACTIVATED: You're mail has already been activated

FOOTER.SUPPORT_BY_DONATING: Support this project with buying a coffee

SECTION1.TITLE: Who are we?
SECTION1.TEXT: Hi. We are team.center. The first events management software you will actually like, because we keep it simple. We’d love to tell you a bit about us.

SECTION2.TITLE: About Team.center
SECTION2.TEXT: team.center is a private sponsered web project from Switzerland. We are currently in Beta status and therefore a lot of new features to improve the user experiance are ongoing. We are happy to receive many feedbacks from you out there. Please just use our contact form.

SECTION3.TITLE: How to support us?
SECTION3.TEXT: You can support our project with buing us a coffee or even more :)
SECTION3.TEXT2: We would highly appreciate liking us on Facebook this way we can keep you members informed about our progress.

SECTION4.TITLE: What is next?
SECTION4.TEXT: Excel (CSV) Upload function to create multiple events and members per one click
SECTION4.TEXT2: Ability for Admins to enable "Event log" view for the members
SECTION4.TEXT3: Google maps for location entires - Other languages - Mobile Apps (Android & iOS)
SECTION4.TEXT4: We are grateful for feedbacks, or recommondations for new features. Please just use our contact form
